data.eml:eml: Hippolytidae and Barbouriidae (Decapoda: Caridea) collected during the Ryukyu “ KUMEJIMA 2009 ” expedition *

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Grave, De, Chan, Tin-Yam, Okuno, Junji (2012): Hippolytidae and Barbouriidae (Decapoda: Caridea) collected during the Ryukyu “ KUMEJIMA 2009 ” expedition *. Zootaxa 3367: 95-102, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.281678
